titleStmt.title: The story of David and Berseba To a pleasant new tune.

publicationStmt.publisher: [by Elizabeth Allde?] for I. Wright [sen.], dwelling in Gilt-spurre, neere New-gate,

notesStmt.note: Printer's name from and publication date conjectured by STC.
In two parts; woodcut illustration at head of each part.
Reproductions of the original in the British Library.
